title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
description: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and accessing a URL, the server returns a HTTP code 200 OK response with no content, instead of returning an HTTP error 404.
OB: When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps, it returns a HTTP code 200 OK response with no content.
EB: When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps, it should return an HTTP error 404 response.
SR:
1. Download and install Tomcat 7.0.0 beta
2. Start the Tomcat instance without deploying any webapps
3. Access a URL on the Tomcat instance
4. Verify that the server returns a HTTP code 200 OK response with no content
Expected: The server should return an HTTP error 404 response
